page.title: 18SCHOOLS and POLITICS
page.content: {SCHOOLS-}8 schools cover the age range of 4-18 years. They are :- {Oldbury Court Infants & Juniors {Hambrook County Primary Bromley Heath Infants & Juniors {ChristChurch Primary {Blackhorse {Barley Close Primary St.Augustines R.C Primary Downend Comprehensive {(Downend Primary}not in area) { {Highlighted schools}contributed data. Oldbury Court has about 230 children and 13 classrooms. Hambrook has 147 children and 5 classrooms. {POLITICS}-The ChristChurch area contains part of the boundary between two parliamentary constituencies. Both MPs are Conservatives. {GOVERNMENT}- In 1985 the Conservatives won the vote for the local government.
